response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is designed to revolutionize your business operations. This exceptional solution has been meticulously crafted to address the specific challenges you're facing, and it comes with a wealth of features that will undoubtedly enhance your productivity and efficiency. Given its high-quality nature and the unique benefits it offers, I propose a price of $15,000 for this product. I believe this investment will pay off in the long run by significantly improving your company's performance. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about how this product can be tailored to meet your needs.", "product_price": 15000}
